title: In 'The Maze Runner', what happens if you are bitten by a crank? - Quora
tags: The Maze Runner: The Death Cure (2017 movie)

response.answer_text: Cranks aren’t like zombies, sure they act like they are but there not. Because food is scarce, if you get bitten by one it is probably because they are resorting to cannibalism. If you are not immune to the Flare there is an extremely high chance that you will now have it, if you are immune you just need to get away ASAP. Hope this answers your question. :)
